name: ガセン音ゲー [Arcade Rhythm Game]
name_original: ガセン音ゲー [Arcade Rhythm Game]
description:
DISCLAIMER: Pressing space will still only take you to the currently mapped out song no matter which one you are hovering over. This will obviously change in the future but because there is only one right now this is just how it is.

ガセン音ゲー is a arcade inspired rhythm game with unique gameplay. The game is currently in development but more songs will be added in the future. This current version of the game features a detailed menu and one fully mapped out song with more to come.

ガセン音ゲー translates to "Arcade Rhythm Game" with "ガセン" (gasen) being slang for game center/arcade, and 音ゲー (otoge) meaning sound game/rhythm game.
